content:
[basic explain]
被攻击时以1%%的机让敌人陷入冰冻状态

[detail explain]
被攻击时以 1%% 的机率2秒内让敌人进入冰冻状态。 (若敌人高于Lv45，则减少进入异常状态的机率；反之，则增加机率)


[if]
    [cooltime]
        1000
    [hit]
        1
[/if]

[then]
    [target]
        `enemy`    -1
    [duration]
        2000
    [probability]
        1
    [reduce probability to human armor at pvp module]
        60
    [active status]
        `freeze`    45
[/then]
